text:
(a)     Departments shall allow persons to make complaints alleging violation of this Chapter to the Department in each language spoken by a Substantial Number of Limited English Speaking Persons. The Complaints may be made by telephone or by completing a complaint form. 
     (b)     Departments shall document actions taken to resolve each complaint and maintain copies of complaints and documentation of their resolution for a period of not less than 5 years. A copy of each complaint shall be forwarded to the Commission and the Office of Civic Engagement and Immigrant Affairs within 30 days of its receipt. 
(Added by Ord. 126-01, File No. 010409, App. 6/15/2001; Ord. 202-09, File No. 090461, App. 8/28/2009)
